amendment.description: Amendment to allow closed-end funds that are listed on a national securities exchange, and that meet certain requirements to be considered `well-known seasoned issuers' or 'WKSIs'.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-163 to allow closed-end funds that are listed on a national securities exchange, and that meet certain requirements to be considered `well-known seasoned issuers' or `WKSIs'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hollingsworth amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 180 (Roll no. 296).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hollingsworth.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hollingsworth amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 180 (Roll no. 296).
